name: Mashed Turtles 64
overview: Frogger inspired game called 'Mashed Turtles', which has been released for the C64. This game originally developed by Fandal+PG for the Atari 8bit, is a multiplayer port by Angelsoft, with spirtes by Dorndof that supports up to 8 players of turtle squashing fun. Requires a multiplayer hardware adapter for more than 2 players.
